user_context.user_request: has una inspeccion rapida para los aerogeneradores de la linea B y linea A de ubicados en viena do castelo
user_context.additional_info: All drones are offline. Using base positions as starting points.

mission_requirements.mission_strategy:
1 waypoint per element
Optimal frontal view
Distance: Adapted to element size
Altitude: vertical midpoint of the element
Yaw pointing to the element's center

Example - Quickly inspect electrical towers A, B and C (30m height):

Waypoint:
  - Position: 15m in front of the tower
  - Altitude: 15m AGL (tower midpoint)
  - Yaw: towards the tower center
  - Speed: standard cruise

obstacle_elements.name: Experimental Turbine 1
obstacle_elements.characteristics: hub_height:80m blade_length: 28m blade_count:3 ground_elevation: 20m tower_diameter:6m rotor_diameter: 56m max_tip_height: 108m min_tip_height: 52m yaw_orientation: 90deg        # heading del rotor 0deg north blade_state: stopped           # rotating | stopped | feathered rotor_speed_rpm: 0             # 0 if blades stopped blade_azimuth_angle: 0deg     # rotor rotation, 0° = blade vertical up blade_pitch_angle: 2deg        # aerodynamic inclination, meaningless for missions

hub_height:80m blade_length: 28m blade_count:3 ground_elevation: sea level 0m tower_diameter:6m rotor_diameter: 56m max_tip_height: 108m min_tip_height: 52m yaw_orientation: 90deg        # heading del rotor 0deg north blade_state: stopped           # rotating | stopped | feathered rotor_speed_rpm: 0             # 0 if blades stopped blade_azimuth_angle: 0deg     # rotor rotation, 0° = blade vertical up, meaningful when the blades are stopped
blade_pitch_angle: 2deg        # aerodynamic inclination, meaningless for missions
